overview.content: We mark the treatment area, apply numbing, then deliver micro-doses of botulinum toxin just under the skin. The toxin blocks acetylcholine release so sweat glands stay inactive while nerves regenerate over months.
overview.title: How It Works

title: Excessive Sweating (Hyperhidrosis) Treatment
description: Micro-dosed botulinum toxin blocks overactive sweat glands in the underarms, palms, or soles for months of relief.

faq.answer: We use numbing cream, ice packs, and vibration distraction. Discomfort is brief.
faq.question: Does it hurt?

faq.answer: No—your body has plenty of other sweat glands to regulate temperature naturally.
faq.question: Will I sweat elsewhere?
How often do I need it?
faq.answer: Most clients repeat every 6-9 months once sweating slowly returns.
